item.title: Okosix will show its biodegradable plastic at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: Healthcare has a plastic problem, but Okosix thinks its bio-derived, biodegradable material can replace single-use plastics throughout the industry.

item.title: What to expect at OpenAI’s DevDay 2025, and how to watch it
item.description: OpenAI's third developer conference is around the corner, and it's shaping up to be the company's biggest yet.
